title: Authorizes the state comptroller to distribute certain funds from the indigent legal services fund to Orleans county
summary: Authorizes the state comptroller to distribute certain funds from the indigent legal services fund to Orleans county.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         1255

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. HAWLEY -- read once and referred to the Committee
         on Judiciary

       AN  ACT  authorizing  the  state comptroller to distribute certain funds
         from the indigent legal services fund to Orleans county

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Notwithstanding any other provision of law to the contrary,
    2  for the 2011 distribution of funds from the indigent legal services fund
    3  established pursuant to section 98-b of the state finance law, the state
    4  comptroller  shall  distribute  funds to the county of Orleans, notwith-
    5  standing the failure of such county to comply with the  requirements  of
    6  subdivision 2 of such section, in accordance with the provisions of this
    7  act.  The  state  comptroller  shall determine the amount of local funds
    8  expended by Orleans county for services and expenses pursuant to article
    9  18-B of the county law during calendar year beginning  January  1,  2009
   10  based on the amounts of local funds reported to the state comptroller by
   11  such  county  pursuant to section 722-f of the county law. The county of
   12  Orleans shall receive a distribution of state funds  from  the  indigent
   13  legal services fund as if such county had complied with the requirements
   14  of subdivision 2 of section 98-b of the state finance law.
   15    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.




        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD03377-01-1
actClause: AN ACT authorizing the state comptroller to distribute certain funds from the indigent legal services fund to Orleans county
